subject: Pro X Ultra fulfillment
description_text:
Goodmorning,

I hope you’re having a wonderful morning today. I placed an order for
pedals and received a tracking number. It seems the package has not moved
from its original location still and I am just wondering if you have any
updates as to when they may be shipped out?
I fully understand these things take time and I am in no way rushing or
expecting anything to change, but if you have any update at all that would
be greatly appreciated!
Thank you in advance for your time

-Regards,

Charles Campanella
1317 Warren drive
Brunswick, Ohio 44212
(440) 202-0685

conversations.body_text:
I just updated my inbox and realised that the package has shipped, so no
worries.
Thank you again~!

On Wed, Oct 29, 2025 at 9:05 AM service@simsonn.com
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us anytime. Have fun!
